qas.question: How do some mixed raced people feel?
How many racial choices are there on standardized tests?
How many race choices may someone check?

answers.text: groups together individuals of many different multiracial types

qas.question: When do mixed race individuals feel marginalized?

answers.text: when applying to schools or for a job

qas.question: Who feels marginalized by Canadian society?
What usually has about 10 race choices?

plausible_answers.text: groups together individuals of many different multiracial types
applying to schools or for a job

qas.question: When do single race people feel marginalized?
When do multiracial individuals feel important in U.S. society?
